channel.title: Need a few admin commands
channel.description:
Hello, i need to admin commands that are,
::mute (username) - mutes the player for 2 days
::unmute (username) - i want this to un mute the player....
::jail (username) - if this is possible i want this one to make it so this person cannot move
::unjail (username) i want this to un-jail the person if this is possible...
::suicide - kills the person who enters the command
PLEASE GIVE ME SOME OF THESE I REALLY NEED THEM
